headline: Honeywell Announces Leadership Team And Company Name For Advanced Materials Spin-off
summary: Leadership team selections include Dr. Rajeev Gautam as Chairman of the Board, David Sewell as President and CEO and Tina Pierce as CFO.Independent company will be named Solstice Advanced...
